ygData.subject: Re: Twinking??
ygData.msgSnippet: Just remember when twinking your lowbies that their corpse will decay in a half hour after death until you re level 6.. There are almost no situations where
ygData.messageBody:
Just remember when twinking your lowbies that their corpse will decay in a half
hour after death until you're level 6.. There are almost no situations where the
GM's can reimburse your stuff, even if you lose your stuff to a bug all they'll
give you is a "leg up" kit which is probably going to be cloth armor.. so I
suggest not even giving them any 'goodies' except money to buy spells with until
then. I've seen tooooo many people lose good stuff this way.

--Tori
